Name: Pilfer
About the game: Pilfer is a stealth game in which the player is free to explore a small town filled with NPCs that live their own life. Sneak into their houses, steal their silverware, and make it to the online leaderboard! Features 10-20 minutes of playtime. A small town to explore. Various NPCs with their own schedule. Special items like swords and gems to find. A lock-picking minigame. Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
